attributes.action: Sterilise Paedophiles and all sex offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the human rights act protect these people, when the ones needing protection are the innocent victims and the future victims of these monsters when they get let out on licence.  Where is the sense of jailing motorists and non payers of council tax and letting these people free.  We must act on this one now!!
